reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully, with one noting it accommodates various chest sizes, and appreciate its 1950's style, comfort, and quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Very Pretty and Form Fitting Dress. Makes you look like you have the Perfect Figure in all the right places. Going to order another one in a different color, Read more
items.author: Jacqueline Castro

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has pockets ❤️
items.body: It has pockets ❤️ So well made, it's replaced my previous favorite dress on the top. Will grab another. Only downside is that the v neck can get a bit immodest if I'm not careful. It doesn't get too short if you have a more voluptuous figure and it's comfy enough to nap in. Read more
items.author: Computer science student

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wicked cute! But faded and pilled after wearing once.
items.body: UPDATE-6/1/24. Sadly after wearing this dress once to work, which that day was to my office, sitting at my desk… parts of the skirt, around the belly area started to pill and fade wicked bad. I haven’t washed it yet, So I’m not sure why or how this could happen. I love this dress so much, I’m really hoping this is a defect. I did put in for an exchange so Amazon will be sending me a replacement. I will give the company/seller the benefit of the doubt and will leave my review at 4 stars until after I receive my new dress and wear it to see if the same thing happens. I was planning on buying more from this company but I think I will hold off for now. If this is a common problem then that means the quality of the fabric is not great.. so we will see what happens. I provided pictures of pilling and fading. It sort of hard to see without zooming in or seeing in person. If this happens after wearing once, I can only imagine what this will look like after washing and wearing a few times. I think I paid $34 for this, to me, that’s expensive for poor quality. ************************************************ I bought the Black Apricot dress, XXL. For reference I’m 5’10 about 230-240lbs. I’m only giving it 4 stars for now only because I just got it and only tried it on. I haven’t washed it or worn it so I can’t comment on how good the quality of the material is and if it’ll last awhile. But what I can say is when I tried it on I thought it looked wicked cute! I have a bit of a gut and so I’m very self conscious of my weight gain, especially my belly area. This actually covers it up pretty good, it’s not tight at all and fits very comfortably. I think the print in the fabric and belt certainly helps cover up my belly fat and also the high cut waste. The skirt falls right below my knees which is also perfect for someone my age. My back is covered as well and the sleeves are a good length. The top part is a little lower cut than I was expecting but I can always wear a snap in piece on my bra that makes it look like a tank top or part of the dress to cover up the girls for when I’m at work. As of now, I have nothing negative to say about this dress. I really love it! I plan on buying another dress similar to this. It’s also not heavy material and should be nice for the spring and summer months without being too hot. I’m always hot from my weight gain, plus on steroids for health reasons, on top of just turning 40 and possibly going thru early stages of menopause so hot flashes are definitely an issue with what I’m going thru. I’m happy to find something nice I can wear to the office or out and about that didn’t cost a fortune. I’m always hesitant buying clothes online since I’m not seeing it in person, but I can recommend this dress. if you don’t end up liking it you can return or exchange it very easily. It’s one reason why I love buying on Amazon. They make it so easy to return items, most things are generally cheaper then in stores. Also due to my health issues it’s not always easy to go out shopping and to try things on so buying things on here, especially clothing is great! Once I wear it which will Most likely be tomorrow lol, I will try to remember to take a picture to share with my review. I hope this information helps. Read more
items.author: Gina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite dresses!!!
items.body: I would give this dress 100 stars if I could! I've purchased it in a dozen colors and I love every one of them. Super comfortable and flattering (have worn them through drastic weight changes) and the pockets are a major selling point. I constantly get asked where I bought the dresses and nobody believes they're from Amazon. They're lightweight but the material hangs nicely and isn't too thing. I would call it a smooth jersey fabric that has stretch and structure. They don't wrinkle and they wash easily in the machine. No pilling, stretching, or other damage from regular wear. Love love love! Read more
items.author: Will

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Will be returning
items.body: This dress arrived today and while the design seems cute, it wasn't for me. I wanted some dresses for the office, but this was not it. The v-neck cut very lower for me--B cup girl problems :'( Aside from them, the fabric felt cheap and unbreathable--not worth $35. I enjoy that it has pockets and a false belt, though I wouldvtle like the belt buckle, which was slightly off centered, to me more intentionally off to one side. Read more
items.author: LH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Silhouette
items.body: I bought this to wear to my daughter's graduation. Love the fit. So flattering and the fabric is comfortable. Perfect for Florida in December. Read more
items.author: Marianna Epright

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and the fabric is great! Also deep pockets!
items.body: Honestly super excited to wear this! I preemptively ordered this for my honeymoon and I'm so excited to wear it! I tried it on make sure everything fit right. I got an XL. I am 5'9 and 200 lb with a larger chest. It was perfect! The fabric is super soft and comfortable. It's a little thicker so you can't see through it at all. The fabric does give a little stretch if needed. the cleavage is a little low but it could be easy to potentially pin if you want. The pockets are great! They are deep and the way that the fabric folds in the skirt. You can't even tell if you have a phone in there. Definitely a good dress for the price I paid. ( I did buy this during Black Friday sales so it was a bit cheaper) Read more
items.author: Kimberly Gardner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars This dress is easy to put on & go. True to size.
items.body: This dress fits perfect. True to your size. Good knee length for a senior, lady 5’ 1” tall. Non iron, light weight. Like most Amazon clothes from over seas, Easy washing, nothing shrinks or wrinkles. I question the fabric. Investigation needs clarification. What chemicals are in the fibers? I did break out in a small rash after wearing a shirt made of the same material. Read more
items.author: Gwen Lipari

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue White, Navy-white, Purple Dot, Purple-blue, Black Floral, Burgundy-white, N Floral-162, Black-yellow, Purple Floral, Black, Navy Red, White Floral, Black White, Black-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
